skills.title: HTML
skills.description: The main language for creating web pages, HTML is written in the form of tags enclosed in angle brackets (like <html>).
skills.links:
[{label:'HTML.net Tutorials', url: 'http://www.html.net/tutorials/html/'}
, {abel: 'Sublime Text 3, a great code editor',url:'http://www.sublimetext.com/'}]

skills.title: CSS
skills.description: Cascading Style Sheets (CSS) is a language for styling web pages.  CSS rules target elements in the HTML document to specify the presentation, such as font, color, spacing, and size.
skills.rankDescriptions:
[
                'You are familiar with the basics of CSS formatting and the box model.'
                , 'You are familiar with media queries and responsive design for adapting your design to fit different devices.'
            ]
skills.links: [{label: 'CSS Tutorials', url: 'http://www.htmldog.com/guides/css/'}, {label: 'Can I use... (browser support)', url: 'http://caniuse.com/#cats=CSS'}]

skills.title: CSS Tools
skills.description: Preprocessors like LESS and SASS help you write more structured and efficient CSS by adding features like variables, functions, and nesting.
skills.rankDescriptions:
[
                'You are familiar with variables and nesting.'
                , 'You can use advanced tools like mix-ins and sometimes write your own.'
            ]
skills.links: [{label: 'Sass vs. LESS', url: 'http://css-tricks.com/sass-vs-less/'}, {label: 'LESS', url: 'http://lesscss.org/'}, {label: 'Sass', url: 'http://sass-lang.com/'}, {label: 'Stylus', url: 'http://learnboost.github.io/stylus/'}]

skills.title: Web Design Mastery
skills.description: You can bring design ideas to life by translating them into the requisite HTML document with CSS styles.

skills.title: jQuery Effects
skills.description: Query provides techniques and methods for client-side manipulation of the web page elements.
skills.rankDescriptions:
['You are familiar with manipulating the document object model (DOM).', 'You are familiar with adding standard animation to a web page.', 'You are familiar with creating and adding custom effects to a web page.'
            ]
